description:
11.16 blockdetect
Determines blockiness of frames without altering the input frames.

Based on Remco Muijs and Ihor Kirenko: "A no-reference blocking artifact measure for adaptive video processing." 2005 13th European signal processing conference.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: blockdetect

parameters.description: Set minimum and maximum values for determining pixel grids (periods). Default values are [3,24].
parameters.name: period_min

parameters.description: Set minimum and maximum values for determining pixel grids (periods). Default values are [3,24].
parameters.name: period_max

parameters.description: Set planes to filter. Default is first only.
parameters.name: planes

source:
11.16 blockdetect

Determines blockiness of frames without altering the input frames.

Based on Remco Muijs and Ihor Kirenko: "A no-reference blocking artifact measure for adaptive video processing." 2005 13th European signal processing conference.

The filter accepts the following options:

period_min
period_max

Set minimum and maximum values for determining pixel grids (periods). Default values are [3,24].

planes

Set planes to filter. Default is first only.
